DataElement.preferredName: Computation Dose Expression Factor Relationship Local Variable Name ISO21090.ST.SIMPLE.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A label that represents the result value of an observation and serves as an input parameter used in a dose expression. NOTE(S): The local variable name is used in the defined substance administration dose expression and will ultimately be substituted with the result of the observation to which the defined expression variable relationship points.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Computation Dose Expression Factor Relationship Local Variable Name
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The act of calculating; determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:A combination of symbols that represents a value.:Anything that contributes causally to a result.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something._A label that represents the result value of an observation and serves as an input parameter used in a dose expression.  NOTE(S): The local variable name is used in the defined substance administration dose expression and will ultimately be substituted with the result of the observation to which the defined expression variable relationship points.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The act of calculating; determining something by mathematical or logical methods.:A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.:A combination of symbols that represents a value.:Anything that contributes causally to a result.:A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Concepts.definition: The act of calculating; determining something by mathematical or logical methods.
A quantity of an agent (such as substance or energy) administered, taken, or absorbed at one time.
A combination of symbols that represents a value.
Anything that contributes causally to a result.
A state of connectedness between people, objects, or events; to be associated or connected with something.

Property.preferredDefinition: A label that represents the result value of an observation and serves as an input parameter used in a dose expression.  NOTE(S): The local variable name is used in the defined substance administration dose expression and will ultimately be substituted with the result of the observation to which the defined expression variable relationship points.

Concepts.definition: A label that represents the value of an observed result and serves as an input parameter used in the substance administration dose expression.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains ST.NT so that it has no language.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
